Package slogo.compiler

Class Workspace

java.lang.Object
slogo.compiler.Workspace
public class Workspace
extends java.lang.Object
Keeps track of all objects that extend WorkspaceEntry. Will notify the WorkspaceViewController of any changes. Internally keeps the WorkspaceEntry objects in Collections. SLogoCommand objects have direct access to this class because they frequently create or use objects in the workspace. For example, a MakeUserInstructionCommand, once performed, would place all the function's required parameters as variables in the workspace, as well as the Function object it creates. When Function is running through its Token objects, if it comes across a generic Token type with no specific subclass, it will search through the workspace for a Variable or Function that matches its toString(). At most one Workspace instance should be created per session of SLogo, and the instance should be created at startup.

  • Constructor Details

    • Workspace

      public Workspace()

  • Method Details

    • add

      public void add​(WorkspaceEntry entry)
      Adds the passed WorkspaceEntry to the workspace. This also notifies the WorkspaceViewController of the addition. In the case that a WorkspaceEntry with the same name already exists, this operation will replace it with the most recently passed object.
      Parameters:
      entry - the WorkspaceEntry to add to the workspace.

    • search

      public WorkspaceEntry search​(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the WorkspaceEntry with the matching name identifier. If not found, return null.
      Parameters:
      name - search String.
      Returns:
      the WorkspaceEntry matching the search name, or null.

    • searchAndAddIfAbsent

      public WorkspaceEntry searchAndAddIfAbsent​(java.lang.String entryType, java.lang.String name)
      Returns the WorkspaceEntry with the matching name identifier. If not found, creates a new entry of the correct type, adds it to the Workspace, and returns the newly created object.
      Parameters:
      name - String name of the entry
      entryType - String description of the entry type
      Returns:
      a WorkspaceEntry object that is found in the workspace or newly created.
